programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: New buyer Jeff uncovers a Cold War keepsake in Gardena, Calif.; Darrell makes a tidy profit on his purchase.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.sub-title: Almost the Greatest Show on Earth
programme.desc: A three-ring circus erupts when the buyers head to Irvine, Calif.; Darrell speculates that Dave has gone broke.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The bidders descend upon Laguna Hills, Calif.; Dave scores a furniture unit; Jarrod and Brandi stroll down memory lane.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Darrell hopes to humiliate Ivy in his own backyard; Jarrod and Brandi are surrounded by pigs; Rene purchases a "crappy" locker.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Chino, Calif., Darrell lets his son Brandon try his luck at the lockers; Dave wins big when he buys in bulk.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The competition is stiff at a high-end storage facility; Dave and Jarrod find a unit containing a classic Jaguar; Brandi and Jarrod engage in a battle of the sexes.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The regulars encounter a mob of eager newbies in Riverside, Calif.; Barry purchases a "mystery trunk"; Darrell acquires a box of old books.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers scour a hippie town for 1970s memorabilia; Barry uncovers a relic from his past; Darrell finds a medical device with profit potential.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers try their luck in Inglewood, Calif.; Darrell talks big but comes up empty; Barry takes a gamble on an ugly-looking unit.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Ivy tries to continue his winning streak; Rene and Darrell play mind games; Jarrod and Brandi visit a crime scene and travel back in time.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: A new bidder hopes to dominate the competition; Darrell battles for a drum set; Jarrod and Brandi face a big loss.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers visit Ontario, Calif., where Darrell wants to take son Brandon to the next level of the business; Barry's unit is anything but chicken feed.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Jarrod and Brandi hope a special guest can sniff out the best lockers in West Covina, Calif.; Darrell and Brandon help their colleagues dress for success; Mary looks for vintage items.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The bidders look for deals in Westminster, Calif.; Dave has discussions with the dead; Barry learns to stop worrying and love his lockers.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The bidders make their Hollywood premiere, with Dave playing the role of storage villain; Barry goes on a buying spree; Darrell makes a profit in a unique manner.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.sub-title: The PA Stays in the Picture
programme.desc: The bidders look for bargains in Rancho Cucamonga, Calif.; Jarrod and Brandi obtain a small set of tools; Barry arrives late to the festivities; Mark hopes a large printer will earn him a large profit.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Homeland, Calif., is anything but friendly to the Harris Brothers; things heat up when Jarrod and Brandi loosen the purse strings.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.sub-title: The Return of the King of Montebello
programme.desc: Brandi and Jarrod split up; Ivy hires a new employee to take care of the shop; Darrell finds success again; Rene learns how to strip.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Jarrod and Brandi uncover the ultimate guy's unit among the lockers in Santa Ana, Calif.; Darrell and Dave battle over a valuable antique.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers invade Rene's home turf of Oceanside, Calif.; Darrell and Brandon fight for a locker containing a piece of cinematic history; friendship is both magic and profitable for Jarrod and Brandi.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Ivy changes his game and pursues a locker with collectibles; Mary looks for quick-sale items; Darrell calls upon a friend for assistance when he is tested by local Mission Hills buyers.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: There are roses for some and thorns for others as the buyers face off in Lake Elsinore, Calif.; Dave arrives with unanticipated optimism, but that doesn't stop him from stirring up trouble; Ivy has to pound unfamiliar pavement.
